mapping.label: Email-Brand mapping JSON
mapping.helpText: A Json string which maps brand names to the associated email addresses. Example: {"brand1" : "service@brand1.de", "brand2" : "service@brand2.de"}

force_selection_of_brand.label: Force selection of brand
force_selection_of_brand.helpText: Selection of a brand will become mandatory
